wathman yahapalana jathika rajaye dewasaraka gaman magathula sama keshathrayakama adwithiya jayagrahana rasak athpath karagena athi awasthawaka, muslim aagamika ha sanskruthika departhamenthuwa swakiya paripalana katayuthu sandaha nawa godanagillak wetha praweshawimath eeta samagamiwa departhamenthuwe ananyathawaya thawaduratath thahawuru karanu was departhamenthuwa sadaha antharjalaya thula web pituwak nirmanaya karamin shri lankawasi muslim jathikayinta ithamath pahasuwen departhamenthuwa ha saha sambandhawimatath, departhamenthuwa magin sapayanu labana sewawan kshanikawa labaganimatath pahasuwana paridi thorathuru thakshanaya yodaganima agaya kala yuthuwa atha.

palamuwanima de thamayi ape rate sanwardhanaya gana hithala yamak karanawa nam ee karana de ratata samajayata hithakara sanwardhanayak wiya yuthuyi.kumbaiyage indala gahaka kolaka indalama siyaluma dewal program wela thiyenne.me kisiwak oopapathika naha.itha kuda siyambaala kolayaka pawa yam kisi kramawedayak sakasmak thikhenawa.ee hamadekama watinakama api awabodha karagatha yuthuyi.ee nisa wishwayath samanga ganudenu karana kota apu me wishwayata aadaraya kala yuthuyi.ee nisa thamayi mama me wyaparaya aarambha kale.ape nishpadana nisa eka gahak ho ithiri wenawa.me wana wita api sinharaje wage bhumi pramanayaka gas ithiri karala thiyenawa.kenek kiyayi ape nishpadana parisarayata ahithakarayi kiyala.namuth ithama nawa thakshanika kramweda osse api eewa nawatha nawatha prathichakrikaranaya kala haki ayurin thamayi hadanne.ee wagema api kadadasi bhawithayath awama karala thiyenne.
